# Colores

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(reticulate)
library(gcookbook)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r, out.width="50%", out.height="50%", fig.align='center', message=FALSE}
ggplot(cars, aes(x = dist)) +
  geom_histogram(fill = "red", colour = "black")

ggplot(cars, aes(x = speed, y = dist)) +
  geom_point(colour = "red")
```
